Player - Class in thelastpromise
This class presents the player to the game along with their name, and the different units that the player has obtained, such as the gold, turn movements, and listens to the time of actions.
Player() - Constructor for class thelastpromise.Player
This receives the integer gold and String name then defines them again in the method.
Player(int, String) - Constructor for class thelastpromise.Player
This receives the integer gold and String name then defines them again in the method.
Player(int, Boolean, String) - Constructor for class thelastpromise.Player
This receives the integer gold, the boolean turn, and the string name, then redefines them again in the method.
Player(int, Boolean, ArrayList<Unit>, String) - Constructor for class thelastpromise.Player
This receives the integer gold, the boolean turn, the ArrayList units, and the string name, then redefines them again in the method.
